name: LD Testing
description:
Level Design Practice

This prototype was a sandbox tool to practice Level Design and Unity parameters using assets for the FPS genre.

This is a project that I trained on to realize Double Dragon - Ghost Towns and be familiar with Unity tools and block out systems. It was easy to use and noob friendly!

Game :

2 levels were created for 2 different game goals.

Level 1 : 

- You have to find a Magic Portal and Enter in it.

Level 2 :

- Destroy all ennemies in the map.

Controls :

NO SWITCH WEAPON

Conclusion :

Nothing special to say about this project, it was just a good fun to get familiar with the assets and tools :)

Team (1 member) :
  • Me :)
Install instructions

Download the zip file, unzip and launch the .exe to play
